page.title: 09Housing Types.
page.content: Ashignton has many types of housing ,some of which were built for the colliery workers.The colliery houses consisted of 9 rows.These houses were very well built and some of the rows have been knocked down to make way for new estate houses to accomadate modern needs.The new estate houses were meant to look modern but they are cold and damp unlike the pit houses which were warm,dry and cosy.Many of the upper class houses are in Wansbeck Road and Green Lane,some of which were owned by pit managers and bosses.Middle class houses are found all over Ashington some terraced,some semi detached and some detached.New estates are being built around Ashington.
